Builds a bill. Add one item exactly.

Constructor Detail

Bill.Builder

public Bill.Builder()
Method Detail

add

public Bill.Builder add(LineItem lineItem)
Adds an item to the bill. Currently only supports one item. Required.

Parameters:
lineItem - for receipt
Returns:
this builder
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if more than one item is added
java.lang.NullPointerException - if item is null

defaultEmail

public Bill.Builder defaultEmail(java.lang.String email)
Specifies a default email address to send a receipt to. Optional. If the user chooses to email themselves a receipt and Square doesn't already have an email address on file, Square will pre-fill the email field with this value.

Parameters:
email - address to send receipt to
Returns:
this builder
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the default email is already set
java.lang.NullPointerException - if email is null

build

public Bill build()
Builds the bill.

Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if an item wasn't added
